description: Charley Chase and Katie Kox are hot and busty submissives in this great role play shot in the beautiful lavish UpperFloor! Charley plays the wife of a cruel master who breaks the rules of conduct in his mansion. She is humiliated by being sexually punished in front of the servant who later participates. Both girls get tied up and beg for forgiveness as they are ruthlessly fucked and disciplined!
title: The Wife and the Servant
